welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burslem, a charming city known for its rich history and bustling markets. We invite you to explore our vibrant streets and experience all that Burslem has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights and by Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.
